text:
It’s okay to kill them, right? They are slaughtered every day. Animals don’t have a voice. They are tortured and often raped too. No means no, we know, but how would animals give their consent?
We kill; we exploit; we torture. We do everything at the expense of these innocent creatures – sometimes for our own satisfaction and other time for our sadistic pleasures. We humans don’t deserve animals. If you still have doubts, Vidyut Jammwal will tell you why!
The most selfless love you’ll ever get is from the animals around you. They deserve a place on Earth as much as humans do. What did animals do to deserve this? We don’t deserve animals… maybe because they are better than us!
